message:
SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 13
Document Classiﬁcation System: RAVN
https://www.wired.co.uk/article/ ravn-artificial-intelligence
• The Serious Fraud Oﬃce investingates corruption at Rolls-Royce.
• There are over 30 million documents seeked as evidences.
• However, they need to classify documents into “privileged”/”non-
privileged”.
• RAVN system classiﬁes 600,000 documents daily where as in the
previous work by the barristers, they only processed 3,000 docu-
ments a day.
• RAVN system cut out 80 per cent of the work.
13
speaker: SYSTEM
